items.title: Advanced Gynaecological Examination Model — M01
items.html:
• Life-size female pelvis with realistic cervix and vaginal canal
  • Speculum insertion & Pap smear practice
  • Bimanual & rectovaginal examination landmarks
  • Replaceable cervix modules (normal, erosion, polyp)
  • Carry case included

keys: Advanced Childbirth Comprehensive skills Training Model
items.title: Advanced Childbirth Comprehensive Skills Training Model — M02
items.html:
• Stages of labor with palpation landmarks
  • Assisted delivery (forceps/vacuum) practice
  • Newborn immediate care scenarios
  • Replaceable perineal repair pads
  • Sturdy storage & transport case

keys: Advanced Childbirth Comprehensive skills Training Model
items.title: Advanced Childbirth Comprehensive Skills Training Model — M03
items.html:
• Normal & assisted delivery practice (forceps/vacuum)
  • Fetal position palpation & rotation
  • PPH management & uterine massage drills
  • Episiotomy & perineal repair pads
  • Maternal & neonatal resuscitation workflow

items.title: Neonatal Resuscitation Trainer — M04
items.html:
• Airway management with visible chest rise
  • Bag-mask ventilation with feedback
  • Umbilical catheterization site
  • Realistic skin and landmarks
  • Prepared for team-based scenarios

items.title: Intravenous Training Arm — M05
items.html:
• Multiple palpable veins for cannulation
  • Flashback of simulated blood
  • Durable skin for repeated practice
  • Replaceable veins & skin sleeves
  • Carry case included

items.title: ECG/Cardiac Rhythm Simulator — M06
items.html:
• Selectable rhythms & scenarios
  • Defib & pacing compatible (training)
  • 12-lead output
  • Battery & mains operation
  • Instructor remote controls

items.title: Adult Airway Management Trainer — M07
items.html:
• Oral & nasal intubation
  • Sellick maneuver & tongue edema options
  • Realistic laryngoscopy landmarks
  • LMA & supraglottic device practice
  • Teeth & dental damage feedback

items.title: Basic Laparoscopic Box Trainer — M08
items.html:
• High-definition camera with adjustable angles
  • Interchangeable task boards
  • Ergonomic trocar ports
  • Software for time/accuracy scoring
  • Compact foldable frame

items.title: Adult CPR/BLS Manikin with Feedback — M09
items.html:
• Real-time depth & rate feedback
  • Head tilt-chin lift & jaw thrust
  • Replaceable lungs/airways
  • Durable torsos for repeated compressions
  • App/monitor connectivity

items.title: AED/Defibrillator Trainer — M10
items.html:
• Pre-programmed training scenarios
  • Voice prompts & metronome
  • Reusable training pads
  • Child/adult modes
  • Remote control for instructors
